Machine Learning

Distributed Tensorflow

Terminology

  • Cluster: A cluster is composed of one or more Tensorflow servers, called tasks.
  • Job: a group of tasks that have a common roal. For instance, parameters server, worker server.
  • Task: A task corresponds to a specific TensorFlow server, and typically corresponds to a single process. A task belongs to a particular ‚Äújob‚Äù and is identified by its index within that job‚Äôs list of tasks.

Deep Learning

Distributed Tensorflow

Terminology

  • Cluster: A cluster is composed of one or more Tensorflow servers, called tasks.
  • Job: a group of tasks that have a common roal. For instance, parameters server, worker server.
  • Task: A task corresponds to a specific TensorFlow server, and typically corresponds to a single process. A task belongs to a particular ‚Äújob‚Äù and is identified by its index within that job‚Äôs list of tasks.
